ValidationRule.description: Checks if the Referral is Stray, and Source is Council / Site or Council Surrendered, the Referral Organisation is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Inbound_Stray', OR( ISPICKVAL(animalos__Animal_Source__c, "Council / Site"), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Animal_Source__c, "Council Surrender") ), ISBLANK(animalos__Referral_Organisation__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Referral Organisation is required if source is Council / Site or Council Surrendered.
